item.title: Development With Docker
item.description: Being a developer for over two decades I am always looking for new ways to improve and simplify my workflow. Recently, I’ve moved to Vagrant which is a wrapper around virtual machine players such as Virtual Box, VMWare Fusion and such. The most current tool that fits the bill, though is Docker. It is such a great tool that I have removed Vagrant and all virtual machine players from my development Macbook Pro!
